comment: Zest 4 Oranges, 2 lemons, and 2 limes.  Mix in bowl with six 5 inch cinnamon sticks, 4 tablespoons dried bitter orange peel, 4 teaspoons coriander seed, and 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg.  Mix all ingredients thoroughly.  Add 8 tablespoons of this mixture with 5 minutes left in the boil.  Does it need vanilla? Juice oranges, lemons, and limes over remaining 5 minutes of boil.
